column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ A man died and another was seriously injured after a car hit a motorcycle and fled
column4: leaving the license plates at the scene.------The incident happened at 1:40 am local time on  November 8
column5: 2018  along the 128 Street and 215 in Veal Vong commune
column7: a 26-year-old male from Prey Veng province was killed. The other man was seriously injured.------According to the source
column8: a white  car “Phnom Penh 2Y-9447” plates was traveling along 215 at a high speed as it approached the crossroads with 128 (Kampuchea Krom Blvd). At the intersection
column9: the car hit a motorcycle with the two men on
column10: dragging it for 20 metres. ------The car then drove off
column11: leaving the number plate behind. An ambulance took the victims to hospital
